title: This weekend's best Apple deals: iPhone, AirPods, Apple Watch, iPads and more
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: Price cuts on the AirPods Pro, iPad Air 4, and the iPhone 12
article: It's a fantastic time to score deals on Apple devices thanks to a host of new devices that were released this week. We're rounding up the top Apple deals for you below, including the iPhone 12, AirPods, iPad, the Apple Watch 6, and more.

Some highlighted offers include the best-selling AirPods Pro on sale for $197 (was $249), the Apple Watch 6 down to $349 (was $399), and the powerful iPad Air 4 on sale for a record-low price of $499.99 (was $599). If you're looking for iPhone deals, Apple has a $100 discount on the iPhone 11 and get the powerful iPhone 12 on sale for $599 (was $799). If you're interested in Apple's newest devices, you can check out the best iPhone 13 deals and today's best all-new iPad deals.

You can also learn more about the upcoming Black Friday deals event and see our guide to the best Black Friday Apple deals of 2021. Shop more offers with our roundup of the best cheap Apple Watch deals and the best AirPods deals.
